welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Eaubonne, France! Get ready to experience the charming atmosphere and rich history of this beautiful city. From its picturesque streets to delicious cuisine, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that Eaubonne has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Le Bourget Airport, mainly used for private and business flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mostly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into seven sub-terminals (2A to 2G) serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A small terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, mostly used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster connection and unlimited data.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport, handling all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is free for the first 30 minutes, then a fee applies.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, mainly used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
